pr_title: Fixes Resolver delete race against file resolve

timeline.message:
Fixes Resolver delete race against file resolve

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>

Added a comment

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>

timeline.body: this is called from the constructor so it does not need to be synchronized
timeline.bodyText: this is called from the constructor so it does not need to be synchronized
timeline.bodyHTML: this is called from the constructor so it does not need to be synchronized
timeline.author: vietj

timeline.bodyHTML:
instead here we should have something that will not block other threads when deleting the dir and just return, something like

File dir;
synchronized(this) {
  if (cacheDir == null) {
    return;
  }
  dir = cacheDir;
  cacheDir = null;
}
if (dir.exists()) {
  FileSystemImpl.delete(dir.toPath(), true);
}
timeline.author: vietj

timeline.message:
Refactor based on review + more checks

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>

timeline.body: shouldn't we rather log this instead of throwing ?
timeline.bodyText: shouldn't we rather log this instead of throwing ?
timeline.bodyHTML: shouldn't we rather log this instead of throwing ?
timeline.author: vietj

replies.bodyText: Currently we throw npe, without a clear message on which resource caused it. I kept the behavior but you also see which resource triggered it.
replies.author: pmlopes

timeline.author: vietj

timeline.body: this should be done under synchronization

timeline.message:
Updates based on review feedback

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>

timeline.body: you can remove this check as it is not synchronized and only check within the synchronized block.
timeline.bodyText: you can remove this check as it is not synchronized and only check within the synchronized block.
timeline.bodyHTML: you can remove this check as it is not synchronized and only check within the synchronized block.
timeline.author: vietj

timeline.bodyHTML:
what you can do is

Thread hook;
synchronized (this) {
  hook =  shutdownHook;
  shutdownHook = null;
}
if (hook != null) {
  // Remove hook
}
timeline.author: vietj
